rules_text:
Enchant player [i](they must be the defending player)[/i]
At the beginning of enchanted player’s upkeep,  that player goads three creatures they control. Put a curse counter on this battle.
rules_text2: Gain control of X target creatures until end of turn, where X is the number of curse counters on this battle as it transformed. They gain haste until end of turn. Untap all creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.
